channel.title: The server is being updated error
channel.description:
Hello, this is the 3rd time im posting about the same problem and still haven't recieved a reply, hopefully this time somebody who knows what the problem might be can actually help me, basically i did the command ::update 120 and i updated the server, i closed the run-server and opened it again, now for 12 hours it has been saying this, and my players can't play
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1z54uc3.png[/img] If anyone knows how to fix this error, incase its hard to explain in comments, please add me on skype: Gmaulcombo

item.title: The server is being updated error
item.dc:creator: @Coltex Coltex
item.description:
@Coltex wrote:

Used the backup source, turns out it has nothing to do with the source basically since i ran the backup source and it still says server is updating for the webclient and the dl client

Read full topic
item.source: The server is being updated error

item.title: The server is being updated error
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

players have to close their client and relog ive the same problem when i do ::update 250 the source keeps open and ive to close my client and restart it then it automatically adds my update and the players close their client and restart it and then they can join again

Read full topic
item.source: The server is being updated error

item.title: The server is being updated error
item.dc:creator: @yoeril yoeril
item.description:
@yoeril wrote:

Go to the ::update command and check what it does, in the mean time run a backup source. Restart the host to and try again.

Read full topic
item.source: The server is being updated error

item.title: The server is being updated error
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

Try to end all java processes and see if it still happens. Maybe a thread got stuck somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: The server is being updated error
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

Do you have a backup of your server? If so replace the backup with your current, you may have to replace your current update command with another one

Read full topic
